citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 p.m. on
01-Jun-17.
I called the phone number provided and an individual stated, no responsible adult was available for inspection.
